Class PinballObject

java.lang.Object
  BallObject
      PinballObject

public class PinballObject
extends BallObject

An object that exists in the pinball class, this is the super class for all types of pinball extending the functionality of the ball object class. Movement can be initiated by repeated calls to the "move" method.

Version:
2017.03.24
Author:
804653, Claire Ancient
See Also:
BallObject

Method Summary
 void ballCollisionCheck(PinballObject pinball)
          Check to see if the ball has collided with another pinball object and set the collision state to true if it has done so.
 void bumperCollisionCheck(PinballObject pinball)
          Check to see if the ball has collided with a bumper object and change the speed and score if it has done so.
 void holeCheck(PinballObject pinball)
          Check to see if the ball has collided with a hole object and change score if it has done so also remove it if the ball is small enough to fit inside the hole.
 void move()
          Move this object according to its position and speed then redraw if the machine is still running and the object is not in a hole.

Constructor Detail

PinballObject

public PinballObject(int xPos,
                     int yPos,
                     double xVel,
                     double yVel,
                     java.awt.Color objectColor,
                     int objectRadius,
                     Machine theMachine)
Constructor for objects of class PinballObject.

Parameters:
xPos - The horizontal coordinate of the object.
yPos - The vertical coordinate of the object.
xVel - The horizontal speed of the object.
yVel - The vertical speed of the object.
objectColor - The color of the object.
objectRadius - The radius (in pixels) of the object.
theMachine - The machine this object is in.
Method Detail

ballCollisionCheck

public void ballCollisionCheck(PinballObject pinball)
Check to see if the ball has collided with another pinball object and set the collision state to true if it has done so.

Parameters:
the - object to act on as class PinballObject.

bumperCollisionCheck

public void bumperCollisionCheck(PinballObject pinball)
Check to see if the ball has collided with a bumper object and change the speed and score if it has done so.

Parameters:
the - object to act on as class PinballObject.

holeCheck

public void holeCheck(PinballObject pinball)
Check to see if the ball has collided with a hole object and change score if it has done so also remove it if the ball is small enough to fit inside the hole.

Parameters:
the - object to act on as class PinballObject.

move

public void move()
Move this object according to its position and speed then redraw if the machine is still running and the object is not in a hole.
